activities: Background screening services provided on candidates who come from the EU/Switzerland to the United States for employment.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Consumer demographic information.  Does not include manual.
privacyprograms: TRUSTe Certified Privacy, TRUSTe Web Privacy
recoursemech: EU DPAs and the Swiss FDPIC for organization human resources data; TRUSTe for all other data.
